attributes.additional_details: I hearby Petition that the subject known as Justin Bieber should be banned and illegalised in Britain. This 'Artist' is nothing but detrimental to the psychological health of the nation driving 90% of the UK berserk and by annoying and antagonizing us by getting 15 year old teens brainwashed into liking him to the point of matyrdom. This is inciting hatred in the country and will eventually lead to civil unrest and having a witch hunt on belieber's so I call upon this nation please save this nation and restore true talent and musical pride in this country.
